name: Robbers, Robbers, Robbers
description: Fairytales are full of dark plots - accidental curses, witchcraft, cannibalism, poison, kidnapping, forced marriage, incest, and murder. You name it and it’s probably been in a fairytale one time or another. As a fairytale protagonist, the problem you’ll be dealing with today are robbers. Robbers in fairytales are known for their evil intentions and brutal acts, not just their thievery,  and it’s up to you to use your wits to survive until the end of the story. Can you outdo those known for their deception and potentially bring them to justice (or just live to see the end of the day)? Inspired by stories from the Grimm brothers, be clever and kind (and the right amount of attractive) and you might just outfox the robbers long enough for a happy ending.
